summary.span: 表示 控件中的单个单元格。

span.span: Represents an individual cell in a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类表示的单个单元格中控件。The class represents an individual cell in a control. 你可以检索到的单元格集合。You can retrieve cells through the collection of a . 行和列标识中的单元格的位置。The row and column for a identify the cell's location in the . 典型的单元格包含特定于的行和列包含它的数据。A typical cell contains data specific to the row and column in which it is contained. 在通过多种方式中，通过设置其属性和处理与它关联的事件可以自定义单元格。The cell can be customized in a number of ways by setting its properties and handling the events associated with it. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此类型。The following code example illustrates the use of this type. 有关此示例的详细信息，请参阅[如何： 添加的 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中的单个单元格的工具提示](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/add-tooltips-to-individual-cells-in-a-wf-datagridview-control.md)。For more information about this example, see [How to: Add ToolTips to Individual Cells in a Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/add-tooltips-to-individual-cells-in-a-wf-datagridview-control.md). summary.span: 获取或设置与单元格关联的快捷菜单。

span.span: Gets or sets the shortcut menu associated with the cell.

value.span: 与单元格关联的 。

span.span: The associated with the cell.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性指示在用户右键单击该单元格时通常会显示的快捷菜单。This property indicates the shortcut menu that is typically displayed when the user right-clicks the cell. 时控件设置属性或其属性是`true`，获取的值属性引发的控件的事件，并返回的值在事件处理程序指定的属性作为。When the control property is set or its property is `true`, getting the value of the property raises the event of the control and returns the value of the property as specified in the event handler. 如果事件没有处理程序，获取的值属性返回以前指定的值或它的默认值`null`。If there are no handlers for the event, getting the value of the property returns the previously specified value or its default value of `null`. 处理使用大量的数据，若要避免性能损失时设置单元格时，事件是主要有用多个单元格的值。Handling the event is primarily useful when working with large amounts of data to avoid performance penalties when setting the cell value for multiple cells. 有关详细信息，请参阅[缩放 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件的最佳做法](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). 更改此属性引发上拥有事件，如果存在。Changing this property raises the event on the owning , if one exists. 你还可以指定快捷菜单，为各个行而不是通过设置行的各个单元格属性或处理控件的事件。You can also specify shortcut menus for individual rows rather than individual cells by setting the row property or handling the control's event. 单元格属性设置重写行属性设置和事件替代同时事件和行属性设置。The cell property setting overrides the row property setting, and the event overrides both the event and the row property setting. 你可以指定`null`为单元格快捷菜单，但是，若要禁止行的快捷菜单重写。You can specify `null` for a cell shortcut menu, however, to prevent a row shortcut menu from being overridden.

span.span: Initializes the control used to edit the cell.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 作为一优化技术，通常的所有单元格的相同类型和相同共享单个托管编辑控件。As an optimization technique, typically all the cells of the same type and in the same share a single hosted editing control. 但是，由的单元格使用该控件之前，它需要由初始化方法。However, before the control is used by a cell, it needs to be initialized by the method. 第一次调用时，则此方法会将控件添加到其父代中的控件的编辑列表。The first time it is called, this method adds the control to the list of editing controls in its parent . 它还会初始化某些单元格的视觉属性。It also initializes some of the visual properties of the cell. 例如，设置要与提供的单元格样式参数匹配的编辑区域的背景色。For example, sets the background color of the editing area to match the supplied cell style parameter. 后续调用不执行任何操作。Subsequent calls to do nothing. 派生的类使用此方法来托管的实例与其类型相对应的类。Derived classes use this method to host an instance of the class corresponding to their type. 例如，包含一个或多个表对象调用此方法可添加单个编辑控件具有所有权的。For example, a table that contains one or more objects calls this method to add a single editing control to the owning . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写派生自的简单类方法类。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method in a simple class that derives from the class. 此示例摘自中提供更大的代码示例[如何： 在 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 单元格的主机控件](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-host-controls-in-windows-forms-datagridview-cells.md)。This example is part of a larger code example provided in [How to: Host Controls in Windows Forms DataGridView Cells](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-host-controls-in-windows-forms-datagridview-cells.md). [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCalendarColumn#200](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCalendarColumn/CS/datagridviewcalendarcolumn.cs#200)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCalendarColumn#200](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCalendarColumn/VB/datagridviewcalendarcolumn.vb#200)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性指示是否可以编辑单元格所显示的数据。The property indicates whether the data displayed by the cell can be edited. 你可以设置的各个单元格，也可以为整个行或单元格的列只读通过设置或属性。You can set for individual cells, or you can make an entire row or column of cells read-only by setting the or properties. 默认情况下，如果单元格的父行或列设置为只读的则子单元格将采用相同的值。By default, if a cell's parent row or column is set to read-only, the child cells will adopt the same value. 可以通过设置重写此默认行为为单个单元格。You can override this default behavior by setting for individual cells. 您可以导航到只读的单元格，并且您可以设置只读的单元格以将当前单元格。You can navigate to a read-only cell, and you can set a read-only cell to be the current cell. 仅影响单元格是否可编辑;它不会影响是否用户可以删除行。 only affects whether a cell is editable; it does not affect whether the user can delete rows.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当鼠标指针位于单元格和属性值不是，此属性的值显示为工具提示的单元格。The value of this property is displayed as the cell ToolTip when the mouse pointer is over the cell and the property value is not . 如果此属性的值是，该单元格将显示工具提示包含单元格的值，如果值为截断在单元格显示; 否则为该单元格将不会显示工具提示。If the value of this property is , the cell will display a ToolTip containing the value of the cell if the value is truncated in the cell display; otherwise, the cell will not display a ToolTip. 您还可以通过设置阻止的工具提示显示属性`false`。You can also prevent the display of a ToolTip by setting the property to `false`. 时控件设置属性或其属性是`true`，获取的值属性引发的控件的事件，并返回的值在事件处理程序指定的属性作为。When the control property is set or its property is `true`, getting the value of the property raises the event of the control and returns the value of the property as specified in the event handler. 如果事件没有处理程序，获取的值属性返回以前指定的值或它的默认值。If there are no handlers for the event, getting the value of the property returns the previously specified value or its default value of . 处理使用大量的数据，若要避免性能损失时设置单元格时，事件是主要有用多个单元格的值。Handling the event is primarily useful when working with large amounts of data to avoid performance penalties when setting the cell value for multiple cells. 有关详细信息，请参阅[缩放 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件的最佳做法](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). 更改此属性引发上拥有事件，如果存在。Changing this property raises the event on the owning , if one exists. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何设置中的事件处理程序属性事件。The following code example shows how to set the property within an event handler for the event. 此示例摘自中提供更大的代码示例[如何： 添加的 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中的单个单元格的工具提示](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/add-tooltips-to-individual-cells-in-a-wf-datagridview-control.md)。This example is part of a larger code example provided in [How to: Add ToolTips to Individual Cells in a Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/add-tooltips-to-individual-cells-in-a-wf-datagridview-control.md). remarks.format: ## Remarks 当将不同的值分配给一个单元格，事件引发控件。When you assign a different value to a cell, the event of the control is raised. 属性是由单元格，包含的实际数据对象，而属性是格式化的数据表示形式。The property is the actual data object contained by the cell, whereas the property is the formatted representation of the data. 和属性分别对应于这些值的数据类型。The and properties correspond to the data types of these values, respectively. 当你将设置属性，指定的值不是自动转换从一个格式化，显示为基础的单元格值的值。When you set the property, the specified value is not automatically converted from a formatted, display value to an underlying cell value. 例如，生效的单元格将被忽略，因此设置到不会导致属性值。For example, the in effect for the cell is ignored, so setting to does not result in a property value of . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何更新单元格的内容与属性。The following code example shows how to update a cell's contents with the property. 此示例摘自中提供更大的代码示例[如何： 操作 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中的行](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-manipulate-rows-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。This example is part of a larger code example provided in [How to: Manipulate Rows in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-manipulate-rows-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).
